snippet: Alabama Coach Nick Saban says that in other leagues, teams often play each other more than once a season -- so why not in college football?
abstract: Alabama Coach Nick Saban says that in other leagues, teams often play each other more than once a season -- so why not in college football?
lead_paragraph: Alabama Crimson Tide players sat at their team banquet on Dec. 4 awaiting the final B.C.S. standings to see if they would get a second chance against the Louisiana State Tigers.

headline.main: The View From Alabama: A Rematch Is the Right Thing
